vsParam:
Um... The thing about this ingredient is...
As for that ingredient...

Oh, Nelke! How about that? You know how to
tell good ingredients from bad now?

Oh, Master Peppermint. Thank you!
[px] is such a good teacher!

It's not true. That's because [px]'s teaching method
is clear and easy to understand â™ª

Thanks for your help.
I really appreciate it, [px].

Now I know how to tell good ingredients from bad.
In addition to that, I learned something critical to an alchemist.
Maybe you could call it attachment.

To an alchemist, it's something indispensable for the gathering process
and gathering on one's own may bring a lot of danger.

Gathering ingredients with guardians...
and partners is complementary.

Killing monsters together, eating together, chatting together.
And that's when you get to see different views...

You can only gather stuff with lots of people
you're attached to. Right, I think I've learned something.

Yeah, good for you, Nelke!
That's exactly what I want to say!

Well, I don't know other worlds well...
But alchemy is called the "skill of attachment" here.

[px] is very excellent...
But if you gather alone, you'll be clumsy.

Oh, clumsy... Hmm. Let's put that aside,
but is alchemy the "skill of attachment"...?
I think it's a good way to call it, Master.

Hehe, you think so~?
Me too!

OK, to master such a skill of attachment,
I'll give you another assignment!

OK! You've gathered lots of ingredients, so now,
it's time to synthesize them...

This time, [px] will make this item too.
So pay close attention to the making process!

This assignment is more demanding than before...
Do watch carefully, Nelke!

Got it! So, [px].
Please show me!
I'll remember every little detail of how [px] makes it!
